name: Kris Yotam
title: Senior Software Engineer
summary: Experienced software engineer with 8+ years of expertise in building scalable web applications. Specialized in React, TypeScript, and Node.js with a strong focus on performance optimization and user experience.

experience.title: Senior Software Engineer
experience.description: Lead developer for the company's flagship SaaS platform.
highlights: Architected and implemented a new frontend using React and TypeScript, improving performance by 40%
Led a team of 5 engineers, implementing agile methodologies that increased sprint velocity by 25%
Designed and built RESTful APIs serving 10M+ requests daily with 99.9% uptime
Reduced build times by 60% through optimization of CI/CD pipelines

experience.title: Software Engineer
highlights: Developed responsive web applications using React, Redux, and Node.js

Optimized database queries, reducing load times by 35%
Collaborated with UX designers to implement intuitive user interfaces

experience.title: Junior Developer
highlights: Built responsive websites for clients across various industries

highlights: Dean's List all semesters
